import { Fragment } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { ExclamationIcon, XIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' export default function DeleteConfirm({action="delete", ...props}) { return (
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} ​
{`${action.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + action.slice(1)} ${props.title}`}

Are you sure you want to {action} {props.title}?

) }
